H0.text: Messina, founded by ancient Greeks, site of a 1908 seismic disaster, is the main port of which island. Crete

H1.text: Messina, founded by ancient Greeks, site of a 1908 seismic disaster, is the main port of which island. Corsica

H2.text: Messina, founded by ancient Greeks, site of a 1908 seismic disaster, is the main port of which island. Sardinia

H3.text: Messina, founded by ancient Greeks, site of a 1908 seismic disaster, is the main port of which island. Sicily

A4.text: It is located near the northeast corner of Sicily, at the Strait of Messina.

A5.text: Founded by Greek colonists of Magna Graecia in the 8th century BC, Messina was originally called Zancle.
